HeroSection.heroTitle: Track your stress levels with ease.
HeroSection.heroDescription: A simple way for students to measure, track, and understand their stress levels throughout the academic year. Save your scan results and monitor your progress over time.
HeroSection.heroDisclaimer: Not a substitute for professional mental health support.

FeaturesSection.sectionTitle: Simple tools to manage your academic stress
FeaturesSection.sectionDescription: Our app focuses on what matters most to students - easy tracking and monitoring of stress levels during your academic journey. No complicated features, just the essentials you need.
FeaturesSection.easyScanningDesc: Quick and simple stress measurement scans that you can complete in minutes. Perfect for busy students on the go.
FeaturesSection.instantResultsDesc: Get immediate feedback on your stress levels after each scan. Understand where you stand at any moment.
FeaturesSection.progressTrackingDesc: Save all your scan results and track changes over time. Identify patterns and trends in your stress levels.
FeaturesSection.zeroSetupDesc: Start measuring your stress levels immediately without creating an account. Quick and hassle-free access to core features.

Footer.desc: This project is created for academic purposes

AboutPage.desc1: Students commonly experience stress during their academic journey, especially during exam periods and assignment deadlines. Many students don't have a systematic way to track their stress levels over time.
AboutPage.desc2: This project aims to provide students with a simple tool for tracking their stress levels. Through our easy-to-use platform, we may help identify stress patterns and empower students to better manage their mental well-being.
AboutPage.disclaimer: MindEase by no means replaces professional mental health support. For serious concerns, please seek help from qualified mental health professionals.

SupportPage.sectionDesc: Need some academic assistant? The student affairs team is here to assist you with any questions or concerns you may have.
SupportPage.emailDesc: They usually respond within 1-2 business days
